product_name: mophie Juice Pack Helium Case - iPhone 5
long_description: With its 1500mAh battery, the ultra-thin, protective Mophie Juice Pack Helium case offers your iPhone 5/5s up to 80% extra battery life. It's so thin, you won't believe there's a battery inside.
short_description: With its 1500mAh battery, the ultra-thin, protective Mophie Juice Pack Helium case offers your iPhone 5/5s up to 80% extra battery life. It's so thin, you won't believe there's a battery inside.
